title: Kobuk Valley National Park: Find a Ride or a Guide
body: Guided Activities in Kobuk Valley       The Alaska Regional Office maintains a directory of commercial businesses with permits to operate in national parks in this region. Visit their site and select this park for a list of commercial businesses authorized to work Kobuk Valley.  In Kobuk Valley National Park, as in all national park units, commercial business activities are limited and require specific authorization and approval from the National Park Service before any guided activity or business can occur.
